vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from Race Forward, through the Government Alliance on Race and Equity (GARE) Summer 2020 Innovation and Implementation Fund to transform a vacant lot in southern Dallas into a community gathering space in partnership with artists and the local neighborhood in the amount of $15,000.00 for the period September 23, 2020 through June 15, 2021; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $15,000.00 in the FY20 GARE Grant Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $15,000.00 in the FY20 GARE Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $15,000.00 - Financing: Race Forward GARE Summer Innovation and Implementation Grant Fund
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from Race Forward, through the Government Alliance on Race and Equity (GARE) Summer 2020 Innovation and Implementation Fund to transform a vacant lot in southern Dallas into a community gathering space in partnership with artists and the local neighborhood in the amount of $15,000.00 for the period September 23, 2020 through June 15, 2021; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $15,000.00 in the FY20 GARE Grant Fund; (3) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $15,000.00 in the FY20 GARE Grant Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement - Not to exceed $15,000.00 - Financing: Race Forward GARE Summer Innovation and Implementation Grant Fund
